p: (1) RPMI1640 Preparation. RPMI powder (1.04 g) was dissolved into 90 mL of sterile distilled water. Afterward, MOP (3.456 g) was added to the solution. To adjust the pH of the solution to 7, a 1 M NaOH aqueous solution was added. Finally, to reach a volume of 100 mL, distilled and sterilized water was added to make up the difference. Using a 0.45 μm syringe filter, the solution was sterilized at room temperature.
